---
# Demo and addons (in jetstream)
users:
  bamboo:
   comment: CI Bamboo User
   groups: 'admin'
   ssh_key: "ssh-rsa  bambooagent"
  djazayeri:
   comment: Darius Jazayeri
   groups: 'admin'
   ssh_key: "ssh-rsa  jazayeri@alum.mit.edu"

docker_deployment:
   - demo
   - addons-stg

nginx_vhosts:
  - listen: "80 default_server"
    server_name: "demo-new.openmrs.org"
    extra_parameters: |
      access_log /var/log/nginx/demo_access.log;
      error_log /var/log/nginx/demo_error.log;
      root /usr/share/nginx/html;
      location / {
        return 301 http://demo-new.openmrs.org/openmrs;
      }
      location /openmrs {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:8080/openmrs;
      }
  - listen: "80"
    server_name: "addons-stg.openmrs.org"
    extra_parameters: |
      access_log /var/log/nginx/addons_access.log;
      error_log /var/log/nginx/addons_error.log;
      root /usr/share/nginx/html;
      location / {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:8081/;
      }
